nodes.text: The GH-44 blaster was a type of weapon used in the days of the Old Republic. In the year 3653 BBY, the Human Zeerid Korr, a former smuggler, wore twin GH-44 blasters in hip holsters while delivering a cargo of weaponry to the planet Ord Mantell. He sometimes replaced these with his single E-11 blaster pistol.
GH-44 blasters were mentioned in Paul S. Kemp's novel The Old Republic: Deceived, which was published in 2011.
